text: Hello, I'm looking to create a Salesforce Case with lead info (First Name, Last Name, Email etc) upon a HubSpot form submission. Is there a way to do this via an http post, or should I look to a third party solution like Zapier?
Salesforce has a direct native integration with HubSpot
We have that, but it doesn't look like there's a way to natively create Cases there based on a HubSpot activity
